title: Villa ready to pay £250k for Brazil forward Nunes
summary: They would need to trigger a release clause of 300,000 euros (£250,000) to sign the 27-year-old.Nunes, who has 22 caps for Brazil, was part of the squad that won a silver medal at the Olympic Games in Paris.

title: Sinner beats Medvedev to set up Draper semi-final
summary: Sinner, who won the Australian Open in January, and Medvedev were the only two major champions left in the men's draw and the match between them was highly anticipated.

title: What have we learned from every team's first three Premier League games?
summary: Manchester City and Liverpool have made the perfect start to the new season with a 100% record after three games, but things could not have gone any worse for Everton.

title: Osimhen made Napoli believe, so why is he heading to Galatasaray?
summary: He is one of the best strikers in the world, a man who led Napoli to a miracle third Serie A title, so no-one imagined the transfer saga of all transfer sagas would end with Victor Osimhen joining Galatasaray on a season-long loan.
